name: Astra Ignota (itch)
description:
Color the whole board using symmetrical galaxies! An innovative puzzle based on an idea from the authors of the Sudoku. Give it a go on Android and help me adjust the difficulty!

  • 40 pleasant, hand-crafted levels. Far more rewarding than randomly-generated ones!
  • Difficulty ramps up from tutorials to devilish
  • A touch of background story, uncovered chapter by chapter
  • Includes an editor to create and share your own levels
Work in Progress

If you play the game on Android I receive level completion time statistics and can adjust each level's difficulty. Thanks a lot for testing!
